00034 include_once("../../include.inc.php");

00036 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules;
00037 
00038 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'altq') {
00039     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00040     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'altq';
00041 }
00042 
00043 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00044     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00045     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00046 }
00047     
00048 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save'])) {
00049     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00050     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules;
00051 }
00052 
00053 if (count($_POST)) {
00054     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['block-policy'] =      $_POST['blockpolicy'];
00055     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['optimization'] =      $_POST['optimization'];
00056     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['statepolicy'] =       $_POST['state-policy'];
00057     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['debug'] =             $_POST['debug'];
00058     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['fingerprints'] =      trim(preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['fingerprints']));
00059     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['states'] =                trim($_POST['states']);
00060     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['frags'] =             trim($_POST['frags']);
00061     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['src-nodes'] =         trim($_POST['srcnodes']);
00062     if (strlen(trim($_POST['loginterface']))) {
00063         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['loginterface'] =  trim($_POST['loginterface']);
00064     } else {
00065         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['loginterface']);
00066     }
00067     if (strlen(trim($_POST['tcp_first']))) {
00068         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['first'] = trim($_POST['tcp_first']);
00069     } else {
00070         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['first']);
00071     }
00072     if (strlen(trim($_POST['tcp_opening']))) {
00073         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['opening'] =    trim($_POST['tcp_opening']);
00074     } else {
00075         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['opening']);
00076     }
00077     if (strlen(trim($_POST['tcp_established']))) {
00078         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['established'] =    trim($_POST['tcp_established']);
00079     } else {
00080         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['established']);
00081     }
00082     if (strlen(trim($_POST['tcp_closing']))) {
00083         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['closing'] =        trim($_POST['tcp_closing']);
00084     } else {
00085         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['closing']);
00086     }
00087     if (strlen(trim($_POST['tcp_finwait']))) {
00088         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['finwait'] =        trim($_POST['tcp_finwait']);
00089     } else {
00090         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['finwait']);
00091     }
00092     if (strlen(trim($_POST['tcp_closed']))) {
00093         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['closed'] =     trim($_POST['tcp_closed']);
00094     } else {
00095         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['tcp']['closed']);
00096     }
00097     if (strlen(trim($_POST['udp_first']))) {
00098         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['udp']['first'] =      trim($_POST['udp_first']);
00099     } else {
00100         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['udp']['first']);
00101     }
00102     if (strlen(trim($_POST['udp_single']))) {
00103         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['udp']['single'] =     trim($_POST['udp_single']);
00104     } else {
00105         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['udp']['single']);
00106     }
00107     if (strlen(trim($_POST['udp_multiple']))) {
00108         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['udp']['multiple'] =   trim($_POST['udp_multiple']);
00109     } else {
00110         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['udp']['multiple']);
00111     }
00112     if (strlen(trim($_POST['icmp_first']))) {
00113         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['icmp']['first'] =     trim($_POST['icmp_first']);
00114     } else {
00115         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['icmp']['first']);
00116     }
00117     if (strlen(trim($_POST['icmp_error']))) {
00118         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['icmp']['error'] =     trim($_POST['icmp_error']);
00119     } else {
00120         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['icmp']['error']);
00121     }
00122     if (strlen(trim($_POST['other_first']))) {
00123         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['other']['first'] =        trim($_POST['other_first']);
00124     } else {
00125         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['other']['first']);
00126     }
00127     if (strlen(trim($_POST['other_single']))) {
00128         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['other']['single'] =   trim($_POST['other_single']);
00129     } else {
00130         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['other']['single']);
00131     }
00132     if (strlen(trim($_POST['other_multiple']))) {
00133         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['other']['multiple'] = trim($_POST['other_multiple']);
00134     } else {
00135         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['other']['multiple']);
00136     }
00137     if (strlen(trim($_POST['adaptive_start']))) {
00138         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['adaptive']['start'] = trim($_POST['adaptive_start']);
00139     } else {
00140         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['adaptive']['start']);
00141     }
00142     if (strlen(trim($_POST['adaptive_end']))) {
00143         $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['adaptive']['end'] =   trim($_POST['adaptive_end']);
00144     } else {
00145         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['adaptive']['end']);
00146     }
00147     if (strlen(trim($_POST['skip']))) {
00148       if (count(preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", trim($_POST['skip']))) > 1) {
00149         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['skip']);
00150         foreach (preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", trim($_POST['skip'])) as $skip) {
00151               $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['skip'][] = $skip;
00152           }
00153         } else {
00154           $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['skip'] = trim($_POST['skip']);
00155         }
00156     } else {
00157       unset($_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules['skip']);
00158     }
00159     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules;
00160 }
00161 
00162 /*
00163 * go back
00164 */
00165 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00166     $_SESSION['pfw']->options->rules = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00167     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00168     reload();
00169 }
